Articles.Content: i like the idea of new decouples for mr2 and mr3

Hi, and welcome to the forums.

Yes I think decouplers for the mk2 and mk3 parts would have their uses.  Though with those profiles being more designed for 'aeroplanes' rather than traditional circular cross-section rockets I would be a little surprised to see them in stock.

Incidentally, you may find it better to include your basic suggestion in your thread title in future - something like 'mk2 and mk3 decouplers? ' would let any browsers (like me) see what you want to discuss, and they may be more likely to stop and have a look.

These parts you've suggested could be useful, in a specific scenario, but are just impractical, like a larger launch clamp for example.  These parts could be found in a mod somewhere, I would guess, so my advice would be to look at Curse or SpaceDock.  Safe travels my friend!
